name: A Legend's past
description:
A Legend's past is a thrilling adventure following the life of the great Unitor, the one who fights for the idea of a united kingdom. Get a glimpse into his eventful life and skillfuly  wield his mighty sword  against the relentless forces of evil.  Help him regain his memory, reignite his reputation, strike fear and command respect wherever you go and most importantly -  follow the fish to glory.

This is a submission to Mini Jam 54: Memories

Theme: Memories

Limitation: The game must start and end as different genres

Time given: 72 hours

Programmer: Kayakaga

Artist: GrimGlory
